name: Signup Stripe Vercel Deploy
description: A Next.js 16 application enabling user signup, Stripe payments, and programmatic Vercel project deployments with AI-powered features

stories.title: Initialize Next.js 16 Project
stories.description: Bootstrap a new Next.js 16 project with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and the App Router for modern React Server Components support.
acceptance: TypeScript strict mode enabled in tsconfig.json
App Router structure with src/app directory
`bun run dev` starts development server on port 3000

stories.title: Configure Biome for Linting and Formatting
stories.description: Replace ESLint with Biome for faster linting and formatting with a single tool.
acceptance: Scripts added: `bun run lint` and `bun run format`
ESLint config removed or disabled to avoid conflicts

stories.title: Install and Configure shadcn/ui
stories.description: Set up shadcn/ui component library for consistent, accessible UI components.
acceptance: Base components installed: Button, Input, Label, Card, Dialog, Form
CSS variables configured for theming in globals.css

stories.title: Set Up Database with Drizzle ORM
stories.description: Configure PostgreSQL database connection with Drizzle ORM for type-safe database operations.
acceptance: Drizzle ORM installed via `bun add drizzle-orm postgres`
Drizzle Kit installed via `bun add -d drizzle-kit`

stories.title: Create Users Schema
stories.description: Define the users table schema with essential fields for authentication and profile management.
acceptance: Schema includes: id (uuid), email (unique), name, password_hash, email_verified, created_at, updated_at
Schema includes: stripe_customer_id (nullable), subscription_status (enum: free, active, canceled, past_due)
Drizzle relations defined for user -> projects relationship

stories.title: Create Projects Schema
stories.description: Define the projects table schema for storing user projects and their Vercel deployment status.
acceptance: Schema includes: id (uuid), user_id (foreign key), name, description, repository_url
Schema includes: vercel_project_id (nullable), vercel_deployment_url (nullable), deployment_status (enum: pending, building, ready, error)
Schema includes: framework (enum: nextjs, react, vue, etc), created_at, updated_at
Index on user_id for efficient queries

stories.title: Create Subscriptions Schema
stories.description: Define the subscriptions table for tracking Stripe subscription details and billing history.
acceptance: Schema includes: id, user_id (foreign key), stripe_subscription_id (unique), stripe_price_id
Schema includes: status (enum matching Stripe statuses), current_period_start, current_period_end

stories.title: Install and Configure NextAuth.js v5
stories.description: Set up NextAuth.js v5 (Auth.js) for modern authentication with credential and OAuth support.
acceptance: NextAuth v5 installed via `bun add next-auth@beta`
auth.ts created in project root with NextAuth configuration
AUTH_SECRET environment variable generated and set
Session strategy set to JWT for serverless compatibility

stories.title: Implement Email/Password Signup
stories.description: Create a secure signup flow with email verification and password hashing.
acceptance: POST /api/auth/signup endpoint accepts email, password, name
Password hashed using bcrypt with salt rounds >= 12
Email uniqueness validated before account creation
Password strength validation: min 8 chars, 1 uppercase, 1 number
Returns appropriate error messages for validation failures

stories.title: Create Signup Form Component
stories.description: Build a responsive signup form with client-side validation and loading states.
acceptance: Form uses react-hook-form with zod validation
Fields: name, email, password, confirm password
Real-time validation feedback on each field
Error toast on failure, redirect to dashboard on success

stories.title: Create Login Form Component
stories.description: Build a login form with credentials provider integration.
acceptance: Form uses react-hook-form with zod validation
Fields: email, password, remember me checkbox
signIn() from next-auth/react called on submit
Redirect to callback URL or dashboard on success

stories.title: Create Auth Pages Layout
stories.description: Build a consistent layout for authentication pages with branding.
acceptance: Centered card layout with logo at top
Link to toggle between login and signup
Dark mode support via CSS variables

stories.title: Implement Email Verification Flow
stories.description: Add email verification using magic link or token-based verification.
acceptance: Verification token generated on signup (stored in DB)
Email sent via Resend API with verification link

stories.title: Add OAuth Providers
stories.description: Enable social login with GitHub and Google OAuth providers.
acceptance: GitHub OAuth provider configured in auth.ts
Google OAuth provider configured in auth.ts
OAuth buttons added to login and signup forms
Environment variables: AUTH_GITHUB_ID, AUTH_GITHUB_SECRET, AUTH_GOOGLE_ID, AUTH_GOOGLE_SECRET
Account linking works when email matches existing user

stories.title: Create Protected Route Middleware
stories.description: Implement middleware to protect authenticated routes and handle redirects.
acceptance: Unauthenticated users redirected to /login for protected routes
matcher config excludes public routes and static assets
Session token validated using NextAuth middleware helper

stories.title: Install and Configure Stripe SDK
stories.description: Set up Stripe SDK with proper initialization and type safety.
acceptance: Stripe SDK installed via `bun add stripe`
TypeScript types for Stripe objects available

stories.title: Define Subscription Plans
stories.description: Create pricing configuration and Stripe products/prices for subscription tiers.
acceptance: lib/pricing.ts exports plans array with tier details
Each plan includes: name, description, price, stripe_price_id, features array, limits object
Stripe Dashboard products and prices created matching config

stories.title: Create Stripe Customer on Signup
stories.description: Automatically create a Stripe customer when a new user signs up.
acceptance: Customer created with user email and name metadata
Error handling if Stripe customer creation fails
Transaction rolls back user creation on Stripe failure

stories.title: Create Checkout Session Endpoint
stories.description: Build API endpoint to create Stripe Checkout sessions for subscription upgrades.
acceptance: Returns session URL for client redirect

stories.title: Build Pricing Page Component
stories.description: Create a pricing page displaying subscription tiers with upgrade CTAs.
acceptance: Three pricing cards displayed in responsive grid
Current plan highlighted for authenticated users
CTA buttons trigger checkout session creation

stories.title: Implement Stripe Webhook Handler
stories.description: Create webhook endpoint to handle Stripe subscription events.
acceptance: Updates user subscription_status on relevant events

stories.title: Create Customer Portal Session
stories.description: Enable users to manage their subscription via Stripe Customer Portal.
acceptance: Portal configured in Stripe Dashboard with branding
Users can cancel or change subscription
Button added to settings page to access portal

stories.title: Implement Usage-Based Billing Tracking
stories.description: Track and report usage for metered billing features like AI generations.
acceptance: Track: user_id, type (deployment, ai_generation), count, period_start, period_end
lib/usage.ts exports incrementUsage() and getUsage() functions
Usage checked before allowing actions (enforce limits)
Usage reset at billing period boundaries

stories.title: Set Up Vercel API Client
stories.description: Configure authenticated client for Vercel REST API interactions.
acceptance: Type definitions for Vercel API responses
Error handling wrapper for API calls
Rate limiting awareness and retry logic

stories.title: Create Project via Vercel API
stories.description: Implement endpoint to programmatically create new Vercel projects.
acceptance: POST /api/projects creates local and Vercel project
Returns created project with Vercel details

stories.title: Implement Git Repository Connection
stories.description: Allow users to connect GitHub repositories to Vercel projects.
acceptance: GitHub OAuth scopes include repo access
User can select repository from dropdown
Calls Vercel API to link repo to project
Displays connected repository in project settings

stories.title: Trigger Manual Deployment
stories.description: Enable users to trigger deployments programmatically via Vercel API.
acceptance: Supports deployment from git ref or direct upload
Enforces deployment limit based on subscription

stories.title: Poll Deployment Status
stories.description: Implement real-time deployment status tracking with polling.
acceptance: Client polls every 5 seconds during active deployment
Status mapped: QUEUED, BUILDING, READY, ERROR, CANCELED
Build logs URL returned for detailed view

stories.title: Create Projects Dashboard
stories.description: Build dashboard page listing all user projects with status indicators.
acceptance: Card for each project with: name, framework, deployment status, last deployed
Status badges: green (ready), yellow (building), red (error), gray (pending)
Quick actions: deploy, view logs, open production URL
Empty state with CTA to create first project
Pagination for users with many projects

stories.title: Build Project Detail Page
stories.description: Create detailed project view with deployments history and settings.
acceptance: Shows project name, description, connected repo
Deployments history table with: commit, status, created_at, duration

stories.title: Manage Environment Variables
stories.description: Allow users to set and manage environment variables for their Vercel projects.
acceptance: Variables scoped to: production, preview, development
Calls Vercel API to sync changes

stories.title: Install Vercel AI SDK
stories.description: Set up Vercel AI SDK for streaming AI responses and integrations.
acceptance: AI SDK installed via `bun add ai @ai-sdk/openai`
streamText helper function created for chat completions
Error handling for rate limits and API failures

stories.title: Create AI Chat Endpoint
stories.description: Build streaming API endpoint for AI-powered chat interactions.
acceptance: Uses streamText() from Vercel AI SDK
Rate limiting based on user subscription tier

stories.title: Build AI Chat Component
stories.description: Create a chat interface component using Vercel AI SDK hooks.

stories.title: Implement AI Project Generator
stories.description: Use AI to generate project boilerplate based on user description.
acceptance: AI generates: project name, recommended tech stack, initial file structure
Uses structured output with zod schema validation
Returns JSON response with generation results
Can trigger project creation from results

stories.title: Build Project Generator UI
stories.description: Create interface for AI-assisted project generation.
acceptance: AI generates suggestions displayed in preview
Create project button initiates Vercel project creation

stories.title: Implement AI Deployment Assistant
stories.description: AI-powered assistant to help troubleshoot deployment errors.
acceptance: Fetches failed deployment logs from Vercel API
Sends logs to AI with troubleshooting prompt
Caches analysis to avoid duplicate API calls

stories.title: Add AI-Powered Project Insights
stories.description: Generate AI insights and recommendations for project optimization.
acceptance: Analyzes: deployment frequency, build times, error rates

stories.title: Implement AI Code Review Suggestions
stories.description: Use AI to provide code review suggestions before deployment.
acceptance: AI analyzes code for common issues
Returns: security concerns, performance suggestions, best practices
Integrates with GitHub API to fetch PR diffs

stories.title: Create Dashboard Layout
stories.description: Build the main dashboard layout with sidebar navigation.
acceptance: Sidebar with navigation links: Dashboard, Projects, Settings, Billing
Header with user avatar and dropdown menu
Responsive: sidebar collapses to hamburger on mobile
Sign out option in user menu

stories.title: Build Settings Page
stories.description: Create user settings page for profile and preferences management.
acceptance: Password change section with current password validation
Connected accounts section showing OAuth providers
Danger zone: delete account with confirmation

stories.title: Create Billing Page
stories.description: Build billing page showing subscription status and usage.
acceptance: Usage meters: projects used, deployments this month, AI generations
Upgrade button linking to pricing page
Manage subscription button opening Stripe portal
Billing history table with invoice links

stories.title: Build Marketing Landing Page
stories.description: Create public landing page showcasing the product.
acceptance: Hero section with headline, subtext, CTA buttons
Pricing preview with link to full pricing page
Footer with links and legal pages

stories.title: Implement Dark Mode Toggle
stories.description: Add theme switching between light and dark modes.
acceptance: ThemeProvider wrapping app in root layout

stories.title: Add Toast Notifications System
stories.description: Implement global toast notifications for user feedback.
acceptance: Toaster component added to root layout

stories.title: Set Up Testing Framework
stories.description: Configure Vitest for unit and integration testing.

stories.title: Write Auth Flow Tests
stories.description: Create tests for authentication flows and components.
acceptance: Unit tests for signup form validation
Unit tests for login form validation
Integration test for signup API endpoint
Integration test for login API endpoint
Mock Stripe customer creation in tests

stories.title: Write Stripe Integration Tests
stories.description: Create tests for Stripe payment flows.
acceptance: Unit tests for checkout session creation
Unit tests for webhook event handling
Mock Stripe API calls in tests

stories.title: Configure Production Environment
stories.description: Set up environment variables and configuration for production deployment.
acceptance: All required env vars documented in .env.example
Stripe live mode keys ready (not committed)
Vercel project created for the app itself

stories.title: Set Up CI/CD Pipeline
stories.description: Configure GitHub Actions for testing and deployment.
acceptance: Runs on push to main and pull requests
Vercel deployment triggered on main branch

stories.title: Configure Monitoring and Logging
stories.description: Set up error tracking and application monitoring.
acceptance: Vercel Analytics enabled for web vitals
Sentry or similar error tracking configured
